config.ctrl_vector_syrm_7kW¶

This script configures sensorless vector control for a 6.7-kW synchronous reluctance motor.

Classes

BaseValues(w, i, u, p, psi, P, Z, L, tau)

This data class contains the base values computed from the rated values.

CtrlParameters(sensorless, T_s, alpha_c, …)

This data class contains parameters for the control system of a 6.7-kW synchronous relutance motor.

motulator
